title: Heir to Murder
description: IN THIS THRILLING CONCLUSION TO THE ADAIR AFFAIRS BY NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLING AUTHOR ELLE JAMES, THE LONG-LOST ADAIR HEIR IS FINALLY REVEALED!Thanks to a DNA test, ranch hand Noah Scott discovers he's heir to a billion-dollar fortune. Now an Adair, Noah must come to grips with his true identity and the shocking murder of his real father. Then he discovers that the one woman he thought he could trust was spying on him for his siblings, and he cuts Rachel Blackstone out of his life.But his father's killer has never been caught… With all those close to Noah targets—including Rachel—Noah needs to set a dangerous trap…using himself as ultimate bait.
author: Elle James
